attributes.action: Do not force healthy and the young to have a vaccine with no restrictions
attributes.additional_details:
No need to show you are vaccinated or not no restrictions in any of our rights 
Young and healthy have a strong immune system
If the vaccine works then it is not necessary for us
Just the elderly and vulnerable but it is still there right to choise
attributes.background:
Elderly and vulnerable may need a vaccine but healthy people and young adults do not we should not be forced 
If we do not want the covid vaccine we should not feel forced. We have the same rights to travel abroad shop work go to pubs and restaurants as vaccinated people

rejection.details:
It is already against the law for people to be required to undergo medical treatment, including vaccinations. The Coronavirus Act 2020 has not changed this.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Prohibit employers from requiring employees to have a Covid-19 vaccine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575607

Outlaw discrimination against those who do not get a Covid-19 vaccination: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575801
